overview: What happens to all of those little things that you lose throughout your life? When Gorman (Gary Jones) misplaces one of his socks, he must struggle to maintain his strict schedule. Preoccupied with the simple challenges of his life, he doesn't notice the moving men and their large payload until it's too late...WHAM! He is struck by a heavy box, catapulting him into his bizarre past.
tagline: One Man, One Sock, And The Pursuit Of Time
title: This Way Up
